import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {useHttp} from '../hook/http.hook' import {AuthContext} from '../context/AuthContext' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' export const ForumThemeCard = ({post}) =>{ return( <>

ForumThemeCard

Дата публикации:{new Date(post.data).toLocaleTimeString()} Автор:{post.author}

Название темы: {post.topic}

Текст темы:

{post.body}

) }
